General.Name: Sino-German United AG
General.Description: Sino-German United AG operates a trading and service company in Germany and the People's Republic of China. It also engages in import and export business; and provision of consulting and other services. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in Munich, Germany.

1.Name: Mr. Philipp  Birnstingl
1.Title: Chief Operating Officer & Member of Management Board
